src:
侍・高橋　ピンチ招くも後続シャットアウト

01 Nov 2019

　「侍ジャパン強化試合、日本５－６カナダ」（３１日、沖縄セルラースタジアム那覇）
　野球日本代表「侍ジャパン」が惜敗した。カナダ代表には３５年ぶりの黒星となった。
　高橋が中継ぎとしての仕事を果たした。四回からマウンドに上がり、五回に２死一、二塁のピンチを招くも後続をシャットアウト。６日・プエルトリコ戦の先発が有力な岸が、発熱のため２日連続でグラウンドに姿を現さず。代役の候補に挙がるサブマリンは「全力で岸さんの穴を埋めないといけない」と気合を込めた。
text:
Tsubaki / Takahashi invites pinch, but shuts out

01 Nov 2019

“SAMURAI JAPAN Warm-up Game, Japan 5-6 Canada” (Okinawa Cellular Stadium Naha, 31st)
The Japanese national baseball team “Samurai Japan” was defeated. Canada became the first black star in 35 years.
Takahashi fulfilled his job as a relay. It went up to the mound from the 4th, and it was 2 deaths and 5 pinches in the 5th, but the subsequent was shut out. On the 6th, Kishi, who was a strong starter in Puerto Rico, did not appear on the ground for two consecutive days due to fever. Submarine, who is a candidate for substitution, expressed his enthusiasm, saying, “We must fill the hole of Kishi-san with all our strength.”
